com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.protocol

Interface PacketMonitor


  • public interface PacketMonitor
    Allows a plugin to monitor the packets being received and sent, but not alter the outcome

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onMonitorPacketReceive(CommonPacket packet, org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Called when a packet is about to be received by the server from a player.
      void onMonitorPacketSend(CommonPacket packet, org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Called when a packet is going to be sent to a player.

    • Method Detail

      • onMonitorPacketSend

        void onMonitorPacketSend(CommonPacket packet,
                       org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Called when a packet is going to be sent to a player. This method does not allow the packet to be altered - use a PacketListener for that!
        Parameters:
        packet - to send
        player - to send to

      • onMonitorPacketReceive

        void onMonitorPacketReceive(CommonPacket packet,
                          org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Called when a packet is about to be received by the server from a player. This method does not allow the packet to be altered - use a PacketListener for that!
        Parameters:
        packet - to receive
        player - from which the packet came
